## Description
Verify factory pattern in PaymentAdapterFactory with unit tests

## Reason for Delegation
Task requires test isolation and factory pattern verification across 4+ files in backend/src/payment directory (PayPalProcessor, StripeProcessor, PaymentAdapterFactory, and their respective tests), involving dependency injection, multiple payment processors, and complex interactions. Total LOC estimate exceeds 400, and multiple domains (payment processing, testing, factory pattern) are involved.
